code: var formatLotteryDate=function formatLotteryDate(lotteryDate){if(!lotteryDate){return{};}var date=new Date(lotteryDate);var dateString=date.toDateString();var hours=date.getUTCHours();var monthAndDay=dateString.split(' ').splice(1,2).join(' ');return{hours:hours,monthAndDay:monthAndDay};};export default formatLotteryDate;
